cause.description:
We want to Stop Bad Hair Weaves and the idiots who get it done.
1. The bad weaves must end immediately.
2. You must maintain & care for your tracks & weave. This means it shouldn't be fallin' off yo head gril!
3. If you're 5'4, your weave shouldn't be 6 feet long, okay?
cause.mission: Stop women & men from putting fake-*ss hair on their head- BUT if you're gonna do it, DO IT RIGHT!!
cause.name: STOP the BAD HAIR WEAVING
